name: voice-flow-mac
description: Voice-Flow - Speech to Text Desktop App for macOS

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:electron
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ELECTRON" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cd app && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron
scripts.dist: npm run build && cd app && npm run dist:mac
